name: City Garbage Truck Driving Simulator 3D Full
name_original: City Garbage Truck Driving Simulator 3D Full
description:
Are you searching a new game to train your driving and parking skills? City Garbage Truck Driving Simulator 3D is your choice! Get into a huge powerful vehicle and start to get unusual driving experience with our awesome rubbish truck simulator game! Launch your garbage truck, collect dumps and clean up the streets — feel like a real driver who is driving a big trash truck!
HOW TO PLAY:
Start your transporting career
Drive a realistic rubbish truck
Pick up all the trash to clean up the streets
Train driving skills to avoid accidents
Become a part of this city traffic
Improve city sanitation easily
City Garbage Truck Driving Simulator 3D features:
Realistic rubbish truck sim
Your chance to improve driving, parking and transporting skills
Big and beautiful city to explore
Economic game for all the ages
Various upgrades for your sanitation truck
Play City Garbage Truck Driving Simulator 3D — clean up the city streets from trash to keep citizens healthy and improve city sanitation! The faster you drive and pick up garbage - more money you earn! Don't forget about the safety - avoid accidents to protect your truck from damage! Good luck!
